ClimDatDownloadR 0.1.7
  • Get started
  • Reference

    Reference

    All functions

    Chelsa.Clim.download.deprecated()

    Deprecated function for downloading the CHELSA climate dataset (1979-2013)

    Chelsa.Clim.download()

    Function for downloading the CHELSA climate dataset (1979-2013)

    Chelsa.CMIP_5.download()

    Function for downloading CHELSA CMIP 5 future climatologies for the years 2041-2060 and 2061-2080

    Chelsa.CMIP_6.download()

    Function for downloading CHELSA CMIP 6 future climatologies for the years 2011-2040, 2041-2070, and 2071-2100

    Chelsa.CRUts.download()

    CHELSA CRU Timeseries Download

    Chelsa.lgm.download()

    Function for downloading CHELSA Last Glacial Maximum datasets

    Chelsa.timeseries.download()

    CHELSA Timeseries Download

    clipping.tif()

    Clipping .tif-raster files in one specified directory

    combine.raw.in.zip()

    Combines all .tif-raster files into a .zip-file

    convert.to.asc()

    Converting .tif-raster files in one specified directory into ASCII-Grids

    getDownloadSize()

    Get Download Size

    process.raster.int.doub()

    Preprocessing data to get real values

    process.raster.offset()

    Preprocessing data to undo offsetting values

    save.citation()

    Save the citation of the downloaded dataset

    stacking.downloaded.data()

    Stacking .tif-raster files in one specified directory

    WorldClim.CMIP_5.download()

    Function for downloading the WorldClim v1.4 CMIP5 future climate dataset

    WorldClim.CMIP_6.download()

    Function for downloading the WorldClim v2.1 CMIP6 future climate dataset

    WorldClim.HistClim.download()

    Function for downloading the WorldClim historical climate dataset

    Contents

    Developed by Helge Jentsch, Maria Bobrowski, Johannes Weidinger.

    Site built with pkgdown 2.0.7.
